alert.note: Alert for Beaufort (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 23 at 3:57PM EDT by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Beaufort County through 430 PM EDT... At 357 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Bayview, or 12 miles east of River Road, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Belhaven, Ransomville, Winsteadville, Core Point, South Creek, Bayview, Sidney Crossroads, Terra Ceia, Yeatesville, Aurora Ferry Terminal, Bayview Ferry Terminal, Sydney Crossroads and Pantego. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
